name: Pet-a-Cat
description:
My contribution to the 20 Second Game Jam is "Pet-a-Cat" where you're on a mission to pet as many of the 7 cats in the game as possible before your time is up. 

 

I used this game jam as an opportunity to start learning GDevelop, and I know the game is a bit rough and could do with lots of refinements, but it is the first time I've used GDevelop, so cut me some slack, please. I also made all my own assets, except for the meow and the boing sound effects (both CC license).
